name: Hollow (demo)
description:
This is a psychological horror/drama game about Erin, a woman in her twenties who is struggling with something awful that happened to her - leading to a bleak situation where she needs to handle her mental condition unaided and unaware of its inner workings.

This project is currently in development, and an early version of the beginning is available to play. It was made with RPG Maker MV. 

The game will always be free to play - but if you want to support us, a donation is welcome! 

Features: 

- Original graphics!!

- Personalized menu (check it out for a bit of insight on the story when playing the demo!) 

- Layered object interactivity 

- Multiple choices that grant some amount of replayability. 

This short demo has about 5 to 10 minutes of gameplay. 

We hope you have fun! And please let us know if you encounter any problems playing it.

- Camila Christie and Hugo Mendes 

The main music theme of the game is made by Invadable Harmony - Go check their work on https://spoti.fi/2Md6Xwn!
